name: Curse of the Ninja: The War of the Blades Episode One - Free

description:
DEFENSIVE WAR ! FIGHT BACK AGAINST THE LEAGUE

Do you like ninja wars! yes here we come with a hot ninja war for you!
In this game You play as a Ninja who have been curse by the league of shadows, so you decide to fight back. Throw the shuriken to destroy the league will fighting shadow monsters, and avoiding deadly traps, fireballs and deep holes.

DOWNLOAD CURSE OF THE NINJA for FREE now !
